## What is Civilization IV: Beyond the Sword?
  
Civilization IV: Beyond the Sword is the second expansion pack for Civilization IV, released in 2007. It focuses on the late-game aspects of the game, adding new civilizations, leaders, units, buildings, technologies, wonders, and scenarios. Some of the new features include:

- A new corporation system that lets you create and spread businesses that can boost your economy or culture.
- New events and quests that add random occurrences and challenges to your game.
- New mods and scenarios that offer different settings and objectives for your game.

Civilization IV: Beyond the Sword has received positive reviews from critics and fans alike, who praised its variety, depth, and replay value. It is considered one of the best expansion packs for one of the best strategy games ever made.
